snippet: Arguing that the regulation violated religious freedoms, several Jewish groups sought to prevent New York City from enforcing a health rule regarding the procedure.
abstract: Several Jewish groups file a lawsuit seeking to prevent New York City from enforcing a rule on ritual circumcisions that is intended to reduce the risk of transmission of herpes; suit argues that Board of Health regulation requiring parental consent before such a circumcision could be done violates religious freedoms.
lead_paragraph: Arguing that the regulation violated religious freedoms, several Jewish groups sought to prevent New York City from enforcing a health rule regarding the procedure.

headline.seo: Jewish Groups Seek to Block New N.Y.C. Rule on Circumcision
headline.main: Suit Is Filed Over Move to Regulate Circumcision
headline.print_headline: Suit Is Filed Over Move To Regulate Circumcision
